fr.sorbonne_u.components.helpers

Class ComponentSchedulableExecutorServiceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.helpers.ComponentExecutorServiceManager
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.helpers.ComponentSchedulableExecutorServiceManager

  • public class ComponentSchedulableExecutorServiceManager
extends ComponentExecutorServiceManager
    The class ComponentSchedulableExecutorServiceManager implements an executor service manager for scheduled pool threads.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant              true

    Created on : 2019-01-07

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Constructor Detail

      • ComponentSchedulableExecutorServiceManager

        public ComponentSchedulableExecutorServiceManager(java.lang.String uri,
                                                  int nbThreads,
                                                  java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService es)
        create a schedulable executor service manager with the given URI and the given number of threads.

        Contract

         pre    uri != null
 pre     nbThreads > 0
 pre    es != null
 pre    es instanceof ScheduledExecutorService 
 post   true                    // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        uri - unique identifier of the executor service within the component.
        nbThreads - number of threads in the executor service.
        es - scheduled executor service to run requests and tasks (scheduled or not).

    • Method Detail

      • getScheduledExecutorService

        public java.util.concurrent.ScheduledExecutorService getScheduledExecutorService()
        return the schedulable executor service held by this manager.

        Contract

         pre    this.isSchedulable()
 post   true                    // no postcondition.
        Returns:
        the schedulable executor service held by this manager.
